source.sqlReaderQuery: select count(*) as RecordCount from saleslt.customer
select max(ModifiedDate) as lastmodifeddate from saleslt.customer

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from saleslt.customer where modifieddate > '@{activity('get HWM date').output.firstRow.Prop_0}' and modifieddate <= '@{activity('get last modify date').output.firstRow.lastmodifeddate}'

select max(ModifiedDate) as lastmodifeddate from saleslt.customer
